website_summaries.verdict: A mouth-freshening choice in pulling oils.
pros: Along with users remarking on the good taste of this product, many reported cleaner-feeling mouths and gums.We also love that it won't leave the mouth with a waxy residue

customer_reviews.title: ... blow to my mouth which resulted in what looked like a small abscess forming on my gum
customer_reviews.text: I had suffered a blow to my mouth which resulted in what looked like a small abscess forming on my gum. My Dentist was all for pulling the tooth but ai tried your pulling oil and in no time the abscess was gone, the pain was gone and my smile was back...thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Horsegirl

customer_reviews.title: Best Oil-Pulling Mouthwash EVER
customer_reviews.text: I've tried straight-up oil pulling and found it rather disgusting. Chiefly the texture of the solidified coconut oil, chewing/melting it in my mouth as I proceeded with the oil pulling. It was so waxy. The Dirt's Natural MCT Coconut Oil is wonderful. First, it's already liquid. It's a bright yellow, with other ingredients (such as peppermint, cardamom, and clove oils) that really help to make your mouth feel fresh. It can be used as a mouthwash as well as for oil pulling. It really helps freshen the breath. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela G. Maher

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: I have bad teeth. Your dirt and mouthwash have whitened my teeth and I have less cavities. My mouth is healthy! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Kay E. Timbreza

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to just coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to just coconut oil. Which I was doing before giving this a try. Easier to use AND taste is better. Note: a little goes a long way! Use less than you think you need. Not only will the product last you longer but it's easier to swish in your mouth too. I ordered their tooth powder and tongue scrapper a while back, very happy with that as well. The order came with a free 'dirty balm' too. IT IS LITERALLY THE BEST! I just ordered another one I love it so much. Never going back to burts bees or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oil Pulling but Better.
customer_reviews.text: Love this - the flavor is great (I mean it's better than just straight coconut oil). I tried oil pulling with plain coconut oil and because of it getting so thick after a couple minutes that was a one and done, ehh tried it not my thing kind of deal. I've only had The Dirt for a couple of weeks but its so easy to take a swish and then swirl it around while one showers or does whatever you do for 10 minutes. Oh and well if you pair it with The Dirt Toothpaste it's even better!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Tastes pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I keep trying the oil pulling since I am convinced of the benefits. I have only been able to find one other product that I have been able to tolerate. That product I am unable to find. I kind of like the small bottle even if it is expensive since when I reorder it will be fresher. This is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Erma

customer_reviews.title: A Maze Ing
customer_reviews.text: Ok this stuff is AMAZING. My mouth is happy. I deal with inflammation and sensitivity with hormonal changes throughout the month. I also suffer from G.E.R.D. & wear a guard at night because of grinding and have had a lot of dental work in my past because of those issues. Since using this product my teeth are whiter, gums are less inflamed, I’m producing more saliva and sensitivity has not been an issue. I use this product every night for about 5-15 minutes before bed and after using a waterpik then sonicare toothbrush with hello brand toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: M.Toro

customer_reviews.title: My problem solved
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey for the size. Would be great if it came with a droplet. That’s what I use to control the amount being used, to last awhile. Overall, it’s a great product in controlling halitosis and canker sores. I’ve tried everything on the market from changing my diet, expensive oral care systems and oral care pills. So, while I think it’s a little pricey... I’ll continue to buy it, because it, WORKS! This product gets more than five stars. Glad I gave it a try. Jaci
customer_reviews.author: Jacey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very strong clover taste and smell
customer_reviews.text: If you don't like the flavor or smell of clover do not buy this product. It does have great ingredients but if you make any mistake in swishing you'll be sorry. If you're still game...then...let me help by saying do not strongly inhale through your nose while you're swishing, as it will somehow go up your nose and the burn is lasting a long time. These ingredients can be a laxative. Also, if you're a puller then you already know that you don't gargle with it. Good luck and happy pulling.
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: I didn't know what to expect
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't know what to expect with this "oil pulling" wash. I'm not used to gargling with oil. It was a little difficult at first, but my mouth has a freshness that I have never experienced. My mind is boggled by it. Bad breath is no longer an issue with this stuff. I am soooo glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: carolynrachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have an auto immune disease that decays my teeth. This is refreshing, soft way to "brush" when it is too painful. Pleasant flavor. Dont put down your sink tho, the oil could build up and clog drains. Just keep a spittoon handy, lol!
customer_reviews.author: squishy

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my sore throat!
customer_reviews.text: I’m no dr. and of course am not making a medical claim...just sharing my experience. I’ve read multiple times how beneficial oil pulling can be and how many toxins and bacteria it can pull from your mouth. Well, I had a sore throat and figured I’d give this a try juuuust to see what would happen. Low and behold the next morning I woke up with no sore throat. It also soothed my throat after i was done. I’ve done this multiple times with this and it has helped every single time!🙌🏻 10/10 would recommend for general use and if you find yourself in my situation, give it a try and see if it has the same outcome for you!
customer_reviews.author: KyndallShea

customer_reviews.title: Great product for relieving bad breath
customer_reviews.text: I love this product ! For me it was hard to gurgle with coconut oil but makes it 10 times easier !!! It removes a lot of debris as well. I have a infected tooth that was causing order that I am going to get pulled soon . However I have been swishing with this and overnight the odor had been reduced 80%. I will continue to buy . Worth the money and leaves my mouth feeling fresh .
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: it seems like a good idea
customer_reviews.text: Gave 2 stars because the bottle looks great. I don't know what I was expecting but not the small bottle I received. The taste was a little shocking as I am very NOT a clove or what ever essential oil they used. I am only able tow swish for 10 mins before I get gaggy. Just a little bit will build up to great quantities very shortly. Don't know if it works on anything other than leaving the clove taste in your mouth which helps you not want to eat anything to add to that nastacular taste in your mouth. Not buying this ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Smerkle

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this but...
customer_reviews.text: It's way too expensive. I actually add liquid coconut oil to it to dilute and make it last longer. I understand that better quality means more expensive but I feel this is really overpriced. I do love the flavor, I use it in the AM for a pulling oil first thing before anything and it leaves my mouth super clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sking

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Effective
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty magical. Most oil makes me gag. They made the flavor so pleasant that I have had no issues using this. I noticed a big difference in my oral health. My breath is better. I have less plaque on my teeth. I also use a tongue scraper and there has been less residue everyday. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Good texture, bad flavor
customer_reviews.text: I typically oil pull with just straight oil, but was excited to try this since it offered some flavor and breath freshening qualities that standard oil would not. I wanted to love this, but the flavor was very off-putting. I think this is definitely a flavor that is very polarizing, and I am personally not a fan. The texture of this is fantastic though, so I may try a different flavor with hopes of a better result.
customer_reviews.author: Camellia Hewell

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients on site states contains grass-fed ghee along with sea buckthorn oil and myrrh (and other great ingredients).... the bottle I received does not have ghee, sea buckthorn or myrrh on the label. I bought this product mainly for those. This is a rather small bottle for the cost, especially since those ingredients are not in the product according to label... but site says they’re supposed to be there.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley J

customer_reviews.title: Love this Oil Pulling Mouthwash!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. It works!!! Mouth feels great afterwards and I can feel the difference in my gums. 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blossom22

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for almost a year now and I Love It! I use it first thing in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for almost a year now and I Love It! I use it first thing in the morning when I get up and my mouth feels clean and fresh after using. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Garling

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It’s my first experience with this company and I am very pleased. The product arrived ahead of time. The fragrance and taste is refreshing. My mouth feels clean and stays odor free for hours. . The texture is perfect for oil pulling. Overall excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Pathways 7

customer_reviews.title: Its definitely a  must try.
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like the Dirt Oil Pulling. Love the taste. My mouth feels amazing afterwards & clean. I need to start using it everyday. I should put it on my bathroom sink so I see it. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste
customer_reviews.text: Purchased based on all the great reviews but couldn’t get past the taste to use the product long enough to see results. Had to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Trish V

customer_reviews.title: Best Oil Pulling Mouthwash on the Market
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of this oil is unbeatable . . . it really makes it pleasant to oil pull. Thank you, The Dirt, for making such an incredible oil pulling mouthwash! Love it and would highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: KP from PA

customer_reviews.title: The Dirt All Natural Gluten & Alcohol-Free Oil Pulling Antibacterial Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time oil pulling and it was an interesting experience. The flavor was refreshing but it was a bit expensive at $18 for a small bottle but maybe that's what it costs, not sure. But I can say this brand was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: I love how fresh and clean my mouth is when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how fresh and clean my mouth is when I swish with this stuff! Just know to have a cup sitting by to spit in because you don’t want the oil to harden in your plumbing when you’re done (of course, that would be the case with any coconut oil pulling solution not just this).
customer_reviews.author: Regina E. Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Works listed
customer_reviews.text: Odd taste but really works well ... got rid of a tooth ache
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: Best mouthwash that I have found
customer_reviews.text: Love it - I would like it to come in a larger bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K. Voves

customer_reviews.title: Better than using Coconut oil all by itself
customer_reviews.text: Better than using Coconut oil all by itself. I looked at the ingredients and was impressed. Haven't seen results yet, but I just started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: ive tried other oils before and they usually have a nasty taste and take a long time to get rid of. this doesn't and mouth feels great aafterwards
customer_reviews.author: Eric W

customer_reviews.title: Breath freshening!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I tried this. It does feel unusual to put a cap of oil in your mouth the first time, but, the fresh feeling it leaves is instantly worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality potent ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product but the flavor is way too powerful for effective oil pulling (for min of 20 minutes)
customer_reviews.author: Sara K.

customer_reviews.title: At least it has a mint taste!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get used to, but I know it will make things better for my body so I'm trying to keep with it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is quite helpful since I am allergic to the majority of mouthwashes. Learning the pull method also helps mouth feel fresher.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product a lot. This is my first attempt at oil pulling and while it took me a few days to get up to the recommended 20 minutes I'm now there. I use this every morning along with the Dirt's toothpaste in cocoa mint. My teeth are whiter and even my gums seem to like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. I really like it. I do try to keep the oil off my lips though because it tingles a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Greengem

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I leave in for 20 minutes. Flavor is good. Leaves mouth feeling refreshed.

customer_reviews.title: Yess!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised by this! Tati on YouTube mentioned it and I have not been disappointed! I have really bad breath. Not with this!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!!! My mouth feels clean for hours after
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Interesting flavor
customer_reviews.text: I am still getting used to the flavor, but I like the effects.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great for teeth and gums
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to swish for 20 minutes and the clove is strong for me but It helps with inflammation and strengthening.

customer_reviews.title: HI - Not sure how to reach you without leaving ...
customer_reviews.text: HI - Not sure how to reach you without leaving a comment. My bottle came with a cracked lid : ( Not sure if this means product isn't safe or fresh.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love all of my Dirt products
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love all of my Dirt products!!! My boyfriend has started stealing mine and he will have to order his own!

customer_reviews.title: I am hooked
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. Tastes good. Feels good. Smells good. Does a great job.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good and makes me teeth feel super clean. I pull while I shower. Good stuff.

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, and my nutritionist approves of it. I believe it works quickly and it actually tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL VANMEENEN

customer_reviews.title: Swish for at least 20 mins to help with constant bad breath
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. My bf has really bad breath even after brushing. After using this it has dramaticly improved
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best mouthwash I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best mouthwash I have ever used. Not only are the ingredients natural but my teeth have never felt better. A must buy for sure!

customer_reviews.title: I like the way my mouth feels after using it as ...
customer_reviews.text: Interesting product. I like the way my mouth feels after using it as a mouthwash!
customer_reviews.author: Toni K. Kawulok

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mouthwash. My mouth and breath feel fresh and ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful mouthwash. My mouth and breath feel fresh and clean. I usually swish for 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie D. Mays

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like a orange spice tea. Swished for about 5min and my mouth felt fresh and clean after!
customer_reviews.author: E. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is interesting. I think it's the clove in it, but I like it- not overpowering and not the typical minty-ness you get with regular mouthwash- but definitely leaves my mouth feeling very clean. I've been using it as more of a mouthwash- swishing for 3-4minutes. I don't know that I have he patience for oil pulling.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinemama

customer_reviews.title: Good till the last drop
customer_reviews.text: Taste great and feels so good in your mouth 👄
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is very small. Granted, the instructions state to only use a small amount, so maybe it'll last a while? When I saw "oil pulling" on the bottle, I envisioned a much more substantial amount of oil to pull with, since I am used to a mounded teaspoon of coconut oil for oil pulling. Maybe it is just my expectations, but I'm disappointed. Perhaps the other ingredients do a great job with everything that is stated, but I'd prefer more oil for pulling.
customer_reviews.author: "eileen"

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the taste of the rosemary and mint so I don't use it any more.
customer_reviews.author: Ejgreen

customer_reviews.title: the taste was foul taste. The Dirt is an accurate name
customer_reviews.text: ridiculously overpriced. the taste was foul taste. The Dirt is an accurate name. with shipping, cost me $24 plus. my fault for paying $19.99 for four ounces of anything. going back to basic organic coconut oil with ground cloves mixed in. much more reasonably priced and a much better flavor. I used it three times, and then threw it in the trash. never have i done that before... especially after the $25 dollar charge. just gross.
customer_reviews.author: dana antanavica

customer_reviews.title: Icky, Icky, Icky
customer_reviews.text: Just ick! I dumped it after one attempt at using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ride to the Music

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd Known Sooner
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this along with the tooth powder. Decided on a whim to try it for myself. Was immediately surprised at how much better it felt in my mouth, and that I could easily swish this around my mouth for 2, 3, or even 10 minutes. Was astonished when, after only a week of using this and the tooth powder, the plaque that always builds up on the back of my lower front teeth, just crumbled off. And it has stayed off. My teeth are squeaky clean, my mouth feels clean, and my gums feel healthier than ever. My 3 boys demanded their own...and don't try to weasel out of brushing their teeth anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca G. Hartop

customer_reviews.title: Great taste with results
customer_reviews.text: I am new to oil pulling, and tried doing organic coconut oil and I couldn't stomach the taste so I switched to this product after reading reviews on another site. I really enjoy the taste and that helps pass the 20 mins during the pull. I have also used it as a mouthwash and it leaves a nice aftertaste. With all oil pulls I notice a whiter and cleaner mouth, but what sets this apart is the taste. Great for new oil pullers and experienced alike.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney H

customer_reviews.title: Like other's have posted
customer_reviews.text: When I'm sickly (allergies, viral infections, etc.), my tongue acts up (gets little bumps all over which are really uncomfortable). In the past, when this happens, I tend to use a dry mouth mouthwash as something in it proves helpful. But this product: Dang! it could be described as a miracle worker. I received Friday, and by Saturday my tongue was back to it's old self. I don't oil-pull, per se; but I do try and swish it for 5-10 minutes while showering. Like other's have posted, I do wish it wasn't so expensive. But at this juncture in my life, I am willing to pay for this miracle in a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Honest product
customer_reviews.text: This product promises the delivery of its contents/advertisement. The swelling of my gum has reduced on the third days of bi-usages per day, morning after breakfast consumption and retiring before bedtime. The sensitivity of my tongue has reduced. The amount needed to switch orally is about the size of one dropper. Once in contact with the saliva, it increased, The usage of Dirt toothpaste is accompanied in my oral hygiene. The toothpase is gritty, and best use with softest brittles.
customer_reviews.author: mermaid

customer_reviews.title: I like the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a few times. Can't really respond on the effects yet. I like the flavor, still can't swish it around as long as I need to reap the effects of oil pulling but I am working on it. I will continue to use the product and look forward to better oral hygiene.
customer_reviews.author: Denise F.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is really good!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is really cool! Tastes great, it's easy to use, smells delicious. Not sure if it's helping my teeth or gums yet, have only been doing it a few weeks, but I use it everyday. Overall body health can be undermined by poor dental health, so I am covering the bases. I also got their dirt toothpaste and I like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Val Heart

customer_reviews.title: Way Overpriced. Very small quantity.
customer_reviews.text: Very small quantity. Highly overpriced. Trader Joe's organic raw coconut oil works just as good, at a far lower cost.
customer_reviews.author: itsjohnib

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste and idea of this, but it makes such a mess in my sink, I won't use it. Almost a full bottle left, which sadly is wasted money. The only solution is to spit in the trash, which isn't OK either.
customer_reviews.author: T. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Wow!..Wow!..and wow some more!!
customer_reviews.text: You have got to try this!! I bought this plus “the Dirt” tooth powder...and a natural toothbrush with charcoal infused bristles....it has been amazing!!..Very noticible difference at my Dental check up !!!! Almost seems too good to be true ...BUT it IS true.You need to give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be working well!
customer_reviews.text: I had an abscess and wanted to try clove oil in the safest way possible. Decided to give this a try and I’m very glad I did. I’ve only used it 4 times for 5 minutes each time and I’ve noticed a significant difference. I will update with anything new.
customer_reviews.author: Rsv424

customer_reviews.title: Great oil pulling method
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff ... the taste is wonderful... it works great this oil is bearable and i highly recommend it i wish it was available on here in the 8oz size ... thanks much

customer_reviews.title: It comes open, no protective cap
customer_reviews.text: This product comes with no plastic safety protection, it’s comes open

customer_reviews.title: Effective. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Makes oil pulling for 10 minutes a little more than bearable. Also it’s an excellent mouthwash too. A bit on the pricey side especially since you can go into your pantry for oil pulling, but it’s a convenient and effective product.
customer_reviews.author: Will White

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept, but can't help but gag
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this because I love the concept. Watched Tati talk about it, so I went for it. I could not get over the taste. It gags me. And, therefore, the cost was outrageous.

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.text: Taste great! Have only used a few times. I am excited to experience all possible results. I am hoping for remineralization if possible.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! It really and truly leaves your mouth feeling very fresh and clean for hours! Super quick shipping and great packaging!

customer_reviews.title: on my 3rd order - doubled the size

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: So tasty! Love it for oil pulling! Leaves my mouth feeling very happy :)
customer_reviews.author: laurenswim

customer_reviews.title: I am a bit surprised at how much I like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit surprised at how much I like this stuff! Used in tandem with The Dirt tooth polish, I end up with a mouth that feels "fresh from the dentist", without the gritty residue. The taste lingers for quite awhile (hours), which means to me that it is still working after all that time. A definite "purchase again" item!
customer_reviews.author: Donetta

customer_reviews.title: NO
customer_reviews.text: the taste and texture made me gag, sorry but this stuffs not for me!!
customer_reviews.author: martha wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and I'm sure it will grow on me
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I'm sure it will grow on me. My expectations were based on standard "mouthwash" products -- i.e. minty thin liquid. This is not your over-the-counter mouthwash --- it's very viscous, potent, and a little goes a loooong ways! A dab will do.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn L. Howard

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. I have bad bleeding gums so I try ...
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. I have bad bleeding gums so I try different mouthwashes and toothpastes all the time. It's only been a week – and I love it so far. My mouth feels the cleanest afterwards. Love the taste, and look forward to use it. My gums haven't been inflamed and they haven't bleed since the second day of use. If this is what I've been looking for, I will continue to buy. Looking good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: I like the product my daughter doesn't like the after taste ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I like the product my daughter doesn't like the after taste not happy about the size of bottle but the product works.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Davis

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Over priced, no difference and annoying sales people keep emailing you begging for a review. Just a gimmick, targeting upper middle class to spend money.
customer_reviews.author: salko hodzic

product_meta.title: The Dirt All Natural Gluten & Alcohol-Free Oil Pulling Antibacterial Mouthwash - Dental Tonic with Essential Oils for Bad Breath, Non-GMO | Luscious Rose Clove and Mint 4oz
feature_bullets: THE DIRT OIL PULLING MOUTHWASH: As a mouthwash, it removes debris loosened by brushing your teeth and using a tongue scraper, and makes your breath smell fresh. As an oil pulling treatment, it helps you prevent long-term tooth decay by targeting bacteria causing gingivitis, plaque, and other harmful microorganisms

ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS: We use ancient Ayurvedic principles to select our all-natural ingredients. Coconut and sesame oils provide the oil pull experience. Clove, mint, turmeric, seabuckthorn, and peppermint oils help clean your mouth and we've added a whole bunch of extra tasty oils, herbs, and spices into the mix to make this a truly delicious experience

EASY TO USE: As a daily cleaner, swish Luscious Rose, Clove, and Mint Oil Pulling Mouthwash for 1 to 2 minutes after you brush and floss. Three to five times a week, swish a capful of the liquid in your mouth for 20 minutes, then spit it out. The oil will cleanse your mouth of microorganisms without resorting to alcohol

MOUTH FRIENDLY: Our Dirt Mouthwash Contains antifungal and antiseptic properties and also vegan friendly and does not contain any of the following: xylitol, sugar, fluoride, hydrogen peroxide, gluten.

SUPPORTS ORAL HEALTH: All ages will love the freshening action of our oil pulling mouthwash. Kids will delight in the fancy bubble gum flavor of the sea buckthorn, and adults will enjoy the minty nature of the oils. Check with your doctor before using natural medicine products if you are sensitive or pregnant. Check out our storefront for more dental products from The Dirt you're sure to love including our bamboo toothbrush, coconut oil toothpaste, and the original tooth powder!
